subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II?
question_hi: महाराजा स्वामी सवाई जयसिंह सिंह एल. के लिए बनाया है?
explanation_en: Amber Fort and Kumbhalgarh Fort are famous forts in Rajasthan, but Kumbhalgarh Fort was built by Maharana Kumbha, while Amber Fort was built by Raja Man Singh I under the orders of Maharaja Akbar. Kumbhalgarh Fort is also known for its unique triple fortification system.

question_hi: राजस्थान की सरस्वामी को कम्बलगढ़ सेंडर के लगी बना करेंगे।

question_en: Which language was used for writing the Mahabharata in Ranthambore Fort?
question_hi: रंगोवाणी के बतमरा मैनामर मैनामरावाणी के बाका बतमराम
